2 (14 ounce) cans whole hearts of palm, drained,1 lime, juiced,1 ½ teaspoons red wine vinegar,¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil,½ teaspoon chili powder,¾ teaspoon kosher salt,½ cup thinly sliced sweet onion,½ cup chopped red bell pepper,½ cup matchstick-cut radishes,⅓ cup matchstick-cut carrots,¼ cup chopped tomato,1 serrano chile pepper, seeded and minced,¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro,1 avocado, diced,,
